title: 01/07/21 - HOUR 1 - Dan Orlovsky
itunes:title: 01/07/21 - HOUR 1 - Dan Orlovsky
description:
In hour 1 of The Dan Patrick Show, the crew reflects on the historical events that took place in the nations capital yesterday. The Big Ten is advocating for a postponement of the National Title game due to Ohio State nearing its availability limit because of Covid 19 exposure. Dan Orlovsky joins to dysfunction within the Texans organization, the best NFL openings and more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
